mapper.select: SELECT hc.id,hc.num,hc.habit,hc.statuscode,c1.name AS status,hc.valueCode,c2.name AS value,hc.reg_date,hc.up_date FROM habitcard hc INNER JOIN commoncode c1 ON c1.detail_code = hc.statusCode INNER JOIN commoncode c2 ON c2.detail_code = hc.valueCode WHERE hc.uid = #{uid} ORDER BY hc.num
